text:
Stepan Grigori Shakaryan (, 23 October 1935 – 22 June 2019) was an Armenian jazz and classical composer and pianist. He was awarded the People's Artist of the Republic of Armenia in 2017. He was a professor at Yerevan State Conservatory. He was born in Baku, Azerbaijan SSR.
Shakaryan died on 22 June 2019 in Yerevan at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: People's Artist of the Republic of Armenia
